title: 论服务器人数高峰期
author: CyanBillows
txt_content:
如题,在下认为有如下三
祖国的生日，
寒暑假。
坛友们觉得呢

replies.author: hello25
replies.txt_content: 周末

replies.author: Ariy
replies.txt_content: 当然是周末啦hhh

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content: 大学dog们课程表巧合地都没有课的工作日时段。

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 一切节假日

replies.author: mc@viphdf.cc
replies.txt_content: 2018年的论坛无论什么时候都比不过三年前的论坛人数

replies.author: 阿淼
replies.txt_content: 然而我在非寒暑假的节假日会被爸妈拉出去到处逛

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 周末二三十个 平常10个左右

replies.author: PandaTV-2060289
replies.txt_content: 周五晚上 周六 和周日 玩家最高峰期

replies.author: 无上荣光
replies.txt_content: 放假肯定人多啊

replies.author: 栗栗栗
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: hane___
replies.txt_content: 畢竟MC受眾主要是學生

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content: 假日正常 寒暑假多点

replies.author: Funny_Sen
replies.txt_content: 节假日呗 周末这样子 还有放学休息时段：D

replies.author: fiktfli
replies.txt_content: 周末肯定多，还有晚上，其他时间基本都没什么人了

replies.author: cixuefeimang
replies.txt_content: 周末肯定多啦，周间晚上人也挺多

replies.author: qiangshuiya
replies.txt_content: 寒暑假和国庆

replies.author: 皓月联机
replies.txt_content: 稳定0人在线 233

replies.author: xydalao
replies.txt_content: 日常晚上   人也挺多

replies.author: Cat_Y
replies.txt_content: 双休日人最多啊233

replies.author: 萌影阿
replies.txt_content: 还有周末呢

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: 日常0-1人哎！

replies.author: pookcock
replies.txt_content: 我觉得人气低的小服 这次一定可以突破10**关！

replies.author: xiaodudu114
replies.txt_content: ：可恶的开学，卷走了80%的玩家。

replies.author: zyx赵永新
replies.txt_content: 读书期间的高峰期也就只有星期六了

replies.author: 寒冽2nd
replies.txt_content: 节假日，和晚上

replies.author: CarlotaAnnabell
replies.txt_content: 最好的是寒假暑假，之后是各种节假日，之后是周六周日，周一到周五平均在线人数就2人很伤qvq

replies.author: xiaowei233v
replies.txt_content: 现在各大中小学生党周末全在补课  估计没时间玩awa  我有一天去散步，散到一个培训机构那边，那里简直是人山人海

replies.author: weiai_qiannian
replies.txt_content: 暑假极限40个躲在角落瑟瑟发抖

replies.author: Flowers_花花
replies.txt_content: 没有一个节日比发福利还要多的
